overview: A lad who’s well fit and sporting tattoos is always gonna turn heads, and in our case (and yours) he’s gonna stiffen cocks, too! The team at BlakeMason has rounded up their favourite inked performers THE TATTOO’D BOYS OF BLAKE! Some are heavily tattooed and others have just a cheeky bit ink, but ALL of them are well up for it. In addition to their decorated skin, you’ll enjoy their thick uncut cocks, tight arseholes, and the downright filthy way they put them both to good use!
title: The Tattoo'd Boys of Blake
